member.name: M:OwinSelfhostSample.V1.ValuesController.Get
member.summary: To retrieve the values of elevator languages
member.remarks: This API should be invoked as api/V1/webui/ElevatorLanguage

member.name: M:OwinSelfhostSample.V1.ValuesController.Get(System.Int32)

member.name: M:OwinSelfhostSample.V1.ValuesController.Put(System.Int32,System.String)
member.summary: Get request to ping the SiPass server for maintaining the session. This method will retrieve Session Token from the http request header and pass it to AuthenticationWrapper to validate the token in SiPass server. Returns a new runtime object with status property as "true" if session exist else return status as "false"

responseCodes.response: login validation failed due to not right time
login validation failed due to expired operator account

member.remarks: This API should be invoked as /api/Authentication
